title: Computations with quasiseparable polynomials and matrices

tldr.text: The Bjorck-Pereyra algorithm, the Traub algorithm, certain new digital filter structures, as well as QR and divide and conquer eigenvalue algorithms are discussed, to obtain true generalizations of several algorithms.
